caseTitle: M/s chiltan Ghee Mills v. Deputy Collector Sales Tax Customs House Quetta & another
tagline: Where the goods that are to be supplied are exempt from sales tax, the question of seeking refund of the sales tax paid on the purchase of raw material used in the production of exempt supplies does not arise at all and where a registered person is exempted from the liability of sales tax on its supplies, it does not mean that the tax that is paid on the purchase of raw material used in the making of such supplies would be liable to be refunded.
